pageContext.collection_description: Papers of the radio and television writer best known for Vic and Sade. Scripts for this radio program comprise the bulk of the collection but there are also materials pertaining to Keystone Chronicles, The Public Life of Cliff Norton and other programs which Rhymer wrote either as an NBC staff member or as a freelance writer. Also includes a few recordings of Vic and Sade, general correspondence, articles about Rhymer and Mrs. Rhymer's book about the Vic and Sade program.
